protocol.name: P-GSE49037-1
protocol.text: Analysis was performed using the affylmaGUI R package (Wettenhall et al, 2006). Robust Muti-array Analysis (RMA) algorithm was used for background correction, normalization and expression levels summarization (Irizarry et al., 2003). ID_REF =  VALUE = RMA-normalized log signal

protocol.name: P-GSE49037-10
protocol.text: Each microarray was hybridized with the Nimblegen Hybridization Kit, washed using the Nimblegen Wash Buffer Kit (both from Roche) and scanned at 2 μm double-pass at 16 bit of resolution.

protocol.name: P-GSE49037-11
protocol.text: Scanned at 2 μm double-pass at 16 bit of resolution with the official Nimblegen scanner.

protocol.name: P-GSE49037-2
protocol.text: Data were analyzed through Robust Multi-array Analysis (RMA) with Nimblegen Scan software (Roche). ID_REF =  VALUE = RMA-normalized log signal

protocol.name: P-GSE49037-3
protocol.text: Plants were transferred to liquid medium supplemented with 30 μM As(V), 30 μM Pi, 1mM Pi (or not supplemented) for indicated times.

protocol.name: P-GSE49037-4
protocol.text: Plants were grown on Johnson medium with 1 mM Pi (7 days), transferred to -Pi medium (2 days).

protocol.name: P-GSE49037-5
protocol.text: RNA was isolated from three independent biological samples for each condition using the RNeasy Plant Mini Kit (Qiagen). Each RNA preparation was tested for degradation using the Agilent 2100 Bioanalyzer (Agilent technologies, Palo Alto, CA).

protocol.name: P-GSE49037-6
protocol.text: cDNA was synthesized from 4 µg of total RNA using One-cycle target labeling and control reagents(Affymetrix, Santa Clara, CA) to produce biotin-labeled cRNA. The cRNA preparations (15 µg) were fragmented at 94ºC for 35 min into 35-200 bases in length.

protocol.name: P-GSE49037-7
protocol.text: 10µg of fragmented cRNA were hybridized to the Arabidopsis ATH1 Genome array (Affymetrix, SantaClara, CA). Each sample was added to a hybridization solution containing 100mM2-(N-morpholino) ethanesulfonic acid, 1M Na+,and 20mM of EDTA in the presence of 0.01% of Tween-20 to a final cRNA concentration of 0.05µg/ml. Hybridization was performed for 16 h at 45ºC . Each microarray was washed and stained with streptavidin-phycoerythrin in a Fluidics station 450 (Affymetrix).

protocol.name: P-GSE49037-8
protocol.text: Each microarray was scanned at 2.5 µm resolution in a GeneChip® Scanner 3000 7G System (Affymetrix)

protocol.name: P-GSE49037-9
protocol.text: cDNA was Cy3-labeled with the Nimblegen One-Color DNA Labeling Kit (Roche).
